summary: The diff adds a new MobileNavMenu component and integrates it into AppShell with md-responsive visibility and admin-gated Settings. No clear missing functional requirements are evident from the provided diff summary, though some acceptance criteria (dismiss behaviors/keyboard specifics) are implicitly handled by the DropdownMenu implementation and not explicitly shown.
